title: Sell Bourbon
metaDescription: Sell your bourbon collection directly to Proof Cellars. We buy Pappy Van Winkle, BTAC, allocated releases, and more. Get a direct offer with no fees.
heroSubhead: We buy bourbon directly - from single allocated bottles to full collections.
introParagraph: Whether you have a single bottle of Pappy Van Winkle or a collection of allocated releases, we provide direct offers with no consignment fees. Our process is straightforward: submit photos and details, receive an offer, and get paid after we receive and verify your bottles.
whatWeBuy: Pappy Van Winkle (all expressions and ages)
Single barrel selections from premium distilleries
whatWeDoNotBuy: Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
conditionNotes: Bourbon condition is assessed based on fill level, seal integrity, and label condition. Original packaging - tubes, boxes, and papers - adds value when present. Signs of tampering, leakage, or significant damage typically disqualify a bottle. Minor label wear or scuffing usually reduces value but does not automatically disqualify.
pricingFactors: Current secondary market demand and transaction history
Bottle condition including seal, fill level, and labels
Presence of original packaging (box, tube, papers)
Expression, age statement, and release year
Rarity and availability in the current market
